name: Battle Shout
target: You and all allies within 2 squares from you
effect:
The target(s) gains {effect:might:Might} and {effect:vigor:Vigor}.
SPECIAL - You can take another Action before or after this one.

name: Devastate
target: One creature in your weapon range

name: Execute
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect:
HIT - [Weapon] damage.
DAMAGE - If you succeed in a Strength roll vs the target's Toughness roll, the target is immediately Dying. Using a two-handed weapon grants you a +2 bonus to your roll.

name: Hamstring
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect:
HIT - [Weapon] damage.
DAMAGE - Inflicts {effect:crippled:Crippled}.
SPECIAL - Hamstring can be used as a {power:melee-basic-attack:Melee Basic Attack}.

name: Knockdown Blow
target: One creature in your weapon range
effect:
HIT - [Weapon]+5 damage.
DAMAGE - The target is knocked {effect:prone}.

name: Overpower
requirements:
Melee Weapon
Trigger: Your Melee Attack misses, or is dodged, blocked or parried
effect:
HIT - [Weapon] damage.
SPECIAL - Block, Dodge and Parry abilities cannot be used against Overpower.

name: Revenge
requirements:
Melee Weapon
Trigger: You are hit by a Melee Attack
target: The creature attacking you(if in your weapon range)
effect: Revenge can be used after the triggering attack is resolved.HIT - [Weapon] damage. You inflict 1 additional damage for each Wound you suffered with the triggering attack.SPECIAL - If the target is at 0 wounds or less after this attack, you can spend an Endurance point to recover an amount of Wounds equal to your Injured value.

name: Shield Bash
effect:
HIT - Roll your shield [Block]+10 damage.
DAMAGE - The target is {effect:stunned:Stunned} until the end of its next round. If you succeed in a Strength roll vs the target's Mass, the target is also knocked prone.

name: Stalwart Shout
target: You and all allies within 2 squares from you
effect:
The target(s) gains {effect:stability:Stability} and {effect:resistance:Resistance}.
SPECIAL - You can take another Action before or after this one.

name: Sword and Board
requirements:
Shield + Melee Weapon
Trigger: You (or an ally adjacent to you) are hit by a Melee Attack
effect:
Roll your shield [Block]: the triggering attack damage is reduced by this amount.
After the triggering attack is resolved, you can make a {power:melee-basic-attack:Melee Basic Attack} as a Free Action against the attacker (if in your weapon range).
You can also trigger Sword and Board also when an ally adjacent to you is hit by a Melee Attack.

name: Threatening Strike
effect:
HIT - [Weapon]+5 damage, and you may immediately {power:swap:Swap} as a Free Action.
DAMAGE - The target is {effect:threatened:Threatened} until the start of your next turn.

name: Whirlwind
target: All creatures in your melee range
effect:
SPECIAL - You can {power:disengage:Disengage} before or after Whirlwind.
HIT - [Weapon] damage.
